name: UIPreviewAction
desc: A preview action, or peek quick action, that is displayed below a peek when a user swipes the peek upward. DeprecatedUse UIContextMenuInteraction instead.

items.name: init(title: String, style: UIPreviewAction.Style, handler: (UIPreviewAction, UIViewController) -> Void)
items.desc: Creates a peek quick action using a specified title, style, and handler.

items.name: var handler: (UIPreviewActionItem, UIViewController) -> Void
items.desc: The block called when the peek quick action is selected by the user.

items.name: enum UIPreviewAction.Style
items.desc: The style for a peek quick action. Use these styles with instances of the UIPreviewAction and UIPreviewActionGroup classes.
